title: Questions on the start of each season
body:
Would it be safe to assume your previous seasons rank means jack shit in the new season?

I just played against someone who was very obviously a better player than me, diving me under rank 6 regularly and killing me while I sat under my tower like it was nothing, basically ripped me a new one and I couldn't do anything to stop it.

I can't find any details on past season ranks to see what rank they were, but I was only silver last rank and think it wouldn't make much sense in the new season to get an S5 Platinum matched against an S5 Silver.

replies.body: Well yesterday, I was bronze 5 last season as I didn't play ranked after going 0-10 in placements, and I vs a gold 2. (he told me) his cs was like double the rest of the game. But i managed to play safe and not feed too much and wait for banks and my team worked together for th win but this guy was streets ahead of the rest of the people....

The guy I played against was killing me, full health to dead, under my tower, level 4 and again level 5. That shouldn't happen, it made it impossible for me to even farm, at all, or even stay in the game and get XP.

> [{quoted}](name=Gintamino Bay,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XWVEzUO8,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-01-21T04:23:34.735+0000)
>
> The guy I played against was killing me, full health to dead, under my tower, level 4 and again level 5. That shouldn't happen, it made it impossible for me to even farm, at all, or even stay in the game and get XP.

What champ were u and what champ was he? What items at the time? etc....
I was Nasus Vs. Riven, just basic start items, she had the sword and I had potions.

At the start of the season everyones MMR becomes closer. So Silver may play Bronze to low plat players at the start. If you dont want to take the risk, wait 2-3 weeks for everyone to go back to "where they belong" and you will get people closer to your league.
